content.content: This is a discussion thread for EIP-6498.  PR can be found at: Add EIP: Signing agreements on smart contracts by akshay-rakheja · Pull Request #6498 · ethereum/EIPs · GitHub  Project can be found at: GitHub - statechangelabs/Polydocs-EIP
content.GPT-summary: The post is a discussion thread for EIP-6498, which is a proposal for signing agreements on smart contracts. The author provides links to the proposal on GitHub and a pull request. The post also invites discussion and questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Hi @aktiontraction thank you and congrats for your first EIP draft! Have you checked the EIP repo and see if there are existing EIPs addressing similar issue? If so, can you provide your argument about whether  you could collaborate with existing EIP you choose the create a competing EIP, which is also fine, but could you demonstrate merits of your EIP over the other one?  Thank you!
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
